required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Study of Intratumoral Injection of CAR-T Cells in the Treatment of Advanced Liver Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: Beijing Immunochina Medical Science & Technology Co., Ltd.

lead_sponsor.agency: Beijing Immunochina Medical Science & Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Beijing Immunochina Medical Science & Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: Objective to study the safety and preliminary efficacy of intratumoral injection of CAR-T cells in the treatment of advanced liver tumors.

primary_outcome.measure: Adverse events attributed to the administration of the anti-GPC3 CAR-T cells

intervention.description: A single arm, open-label pilot study is designed to determine the safety and efficacy of anti-GPC3 CAR-T cells in patients with GPC3-positive advanced liver cancer.

facility.name: The Fifth Medical Center of Chinese PLA General Hospital
